column5: Fresh and cozy nautical themed 1921 Galveston craftsman second floor guest suite for your stay on the island, plus a private balcony? NO ADDED FEES. We offer private, monitored off street parking and a keyless entry only a half a block from the beach. Perfect location and size to unwind and reconnect for two guest. One of our favorite things to do is take a mug of java on a short walk and catch a beautiful sunrise on Seawall. Hope to see you at Captains Quarters.
column8: The Captains Quarters, a 1921 guest suite for two!
